name: Dissonance ([CoolNameHere])
description:
Made for the Epic MegaJam 2018

"Reality is Often Inaccurate!"

Each level has two maps which you need to traverse to proceed to the next level.

The Goal: Move, collect orbs, avoid traps, and access portals to jump between worlds. Travel through both worlds to reach your reality!

Additional info: This is a prototype that is currently in development. We intend to add more levels and features to better enrich the game play in the future.

Disclaimer: This is the first time we have built a game, let alone do it within 5 days.
